summary: TDD implementation complete for Issue #159. Added NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION build-time environment variable to next.config.js, APP_VERSION_DISPLAY module-level constant to WorktreeDetailRefactored.tsx, and Version display sections to both InfoModal (desktop) and MobileInfoContent (mobile). All 4 tests pass, TypeScript and ESLint checks pass with 0 errors.
